title: Shwetank Kumar
text:
About
I’m a physicist, engineering exec, investor.
Some things about me:

Born and brought up in New Delhi, India. I still consider myself a Delhi native
Went to school at IIT Delhi for EE (B.Tech.), Caltech for Applied Physics (Ph.D.)
Live in SF and like to spend my time here and in NCR India

Over the years I have done some interesting technical work. Reverse chronologically:

Created an ML based risk framework i.e. risk score, to improve cost of risk car sharing marketplace (Turo)
Conceived and created geospatial analytics platform (Orbital Insight)
Founded and was technical editor for the first universal stylus initiative specification (Intel)
Architected forcepad and palm rejection (Synaptics)
One of the 2 scientists to build out the quantum computing experiments group. List of publications (IBM)
